DOC.brief_summary: THVD-201 is a novel combination of a muscarinic antagonist (tolterodine) and a muscarinic agonist (pilocarpine).
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Novel Combinations of Tolterodine/Pilocarpine on Pharmacokinetics (PK) and Pharmacodynamics (PD) of Tolterodine in Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Because of the limitations of taking two medications separated by a period of time to minimise these adverse events, two novel formulations were developed to improve compliance and ease of administration. This study will evaluate these formulations in terms of their pharmacokinetic profiles and effects on SSF. In addition, the effects of this combination and its entities on urine frequency and safety/tolerability will be assessed.
DOC.criteria: Healthy males, 18 45 years of age. BMI 2030 m2. Subjects who have a history of sensitivity to antimuscarinic or muscarinic agents or related derivatives. Clinically significant ECG, vital signs and clinical laboratory indices.
